text: - You go too fast.- Do you have it?
title: Amadeus

text: - Bassoon to trombone what?- With the tenors.
title: Amadeus

text: - Identical?- The instruments doubling the voices.
title: Amadeus

text: Trumpets and timpani.Trumpets in D. Listen.
title: Amadeus

text: Trumpets in D, tonic and dominant,first and third beats.
title: Amadeus

text: No, now for the real fire.Strings in unison.
title: Amadeus

text: Do you have it? Show me.
title: Amadeus

text: - It's wonderful!- Yes, yes. Go on.
title: Amadeus

text: Sopranos and altos in thirds.Altos on C, sopranos above.
title: Amadeus

text: Sopranos up to F on the second "voca"?
title: Amadeus

text: And on "dictus". And underneath,just violins. Arpeggios.
title: Amadeus

text: Scale in eighth notes,then back to ostinato.
title: Amadeus

text: - Do you have it?- You go too fast.
title: Amadeus

text: - Do you have it?- One moment, please!
title: Amadeus

text: Good. Show me the whole thingfrom the beginning.
title: Amadeus

text: Do you want to rest a bit?
title: Amadeus

text: No, I'm not tired at all.
title: Amadeus

text: - Then we'll finish the "Lacrimosa".- I can keep going. I assure you.
title: Amadeus

text: Will you stay with mewhile I sleep a little?
title: Amadeus

text: I thought you did not carefor my work, or me.
title: Amadeus

text: Because, madame, I was at hand.
title: Amadeus

text: Well, thank you very much.You can go now.
title: Amadeus

text: And I don't want you here.Just go, please.
title: Amadeus

text: - He asked me to stay.- And I'm ask...
title: Amadeus

text: And I'll try to do better too.
title: Amadeus

text: No, Wolfie, not this. Not this.
title: Amadeus

text: You're not to work on this ever again.
title: Amadeus

text: He's not to work on this anymore.
title: Amadeus

text: I regret we have no servantsto show you out, "Herr Salieri".
title: Amadeus

text: Please respect my wish and go.
title: Amadeus

text: He destroyed his own beloved,rather than let a mediocrity...
title: Amadeus

text: ...share in the smallest partof his glory.
title: Amadeus

text: And kept me alive to torture.
title: Amadeus

text: Thirty-two years of slowlywatching myself become extinct.
title: Amadeus

text: ...till no one plays it at all.
title: Amadeus

text: Good morning, professor.Time for the water closet.
title: Amadeus

text: Then we have your favorite breakfast.Sugar rolls. He loves those.
title: Amadeus

text: I will speak for you, Father.
title: Amadeus

text: I speak for all mediocritiesin the world.
title: Amadeus
